translation.en: Hey, birthday girl! Happy 21st!
translation.zh: 嘿 寿星女！21岁生日快乐！

translation.en: Have fun tonight, ladies. Just remember to make good…
translation.zh: 今晚尽情享乐吧 女士们 但记得要做出正确的…

translation.en: choices.
translation.zh: 选择

translation.en: [Chad] Hey, bottle chick!
translation.zh: 嘿 小酒妹！

translation.en: Be a sweetheart and grab another round of these bad boys?
translation.zh: 麻烦你再给我们来一轮这些好东西

translation.en: Get it yourself. I only serve VIP.
translation.zh: 自己去拿吧 我只为贵宾服务

translation.en: Ignore her. You guys are very important.
translation.zh: 别管她 你们都是贵宾

translation.en: Oh! Beach ball!
translation.zh: 沙滩球！

translation.en: -Hurry up. Hurry up! -I am hurrying.
translation.zh: -快点！ -我已经很快了

translation.en: [Ava] There you go.
translation.zh: 这是你的

translation.en: -[Maya] Ava, we might have a problem. -What is it?
translation.zh: -艾娃 我们可能有麻烦了 -什么事？

translation.en: My sensors are picking up something. Got a countdown and heat signature.
translation.zh: （马特·法兰克） 我的传感器探测到一些东西 有倒计时和热信号

translation.en: Coming from under the pool.
translation.zh: 从泳池下面传来的

translation.en: What? How much time?
translation.zh: 什么？还剩多少时间？

translation.en: -Eighty-three seconds and counting. -That doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: -倒数83秒 -这说不通

translation.en: I've got eyes on the target. Blowing himself up is not his MO.
translation.zh: 我看到目标了 炸死自己不是他的作风

translation.en: I don't know. I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我觉得这可说不准

translation.en: MOs change. This guy's a wild card.
translation.zh: 作风可以改变 这是个难以捉摸的家伙

translation.en: Yeah, well so are you.
translation.zh: 对啊 你也是

translation.en: The hell were you doing talking to me earlier?
translation.zh: 你刚才为什么要跟我说话？

translation.en: Playing a Vegas douchebag, like we talked about.
translation.zh: 我只是按计划行事 扮演一个拉斯维加斯的混蛋

translation.en: -The role you were born to play. -[exclaims]
translation.zh: 你天生就适合演这种角色

translation.en: Sixty seconds.
translation.zh: 还剩60秒

translation.en: Ready to engage.
translation.zh: 准备好行动了

translation.en: Gomez, look alive.
translation.zh: 戈麦斯 准备

translation.en: [Angela] Copy that. Target is in the crosshairs.
translation.zh: 收到 已经瞄准目标

translation.en: I can outfit his head with a new hole on your command. Just say the word.
translation.zh: 只要你一声令下 我就可以 给他的脑袋上个新洞 随时候命

translation.en: McKnight, you do not say the word. Koslov is no martyr.
translation.zh: 麦克奈特 不准下命令 科索沃不是烈士

translation.en: Killing him does nothing to stop the threat.
translation.zh: 杀了他并不能解除威胁

translation.en: Under a minute means there's no time to find and deactivate the nuke.
translation.zh: 剩下不到一分钟 也就是说 没时间找到核弹并将它拆除了

translation.en: For all we know, his phone is the detonator.
translation.zh: 说不定他的手机就是引爆器

translation.en: I have a clean shot.
translation.zh: 已经瞄准目标

translation.en: I can take out his muscle. No collateral damage.
translation.zh: 我可以干掉他的保镖 这样就不会造成连带伤害

translation.en: Except flushing months of work down the drain.
translation.zh: 除了让我们几个月的努力付诸东流

translation.en: Do not take that shot.
translation.zh: 不准开枪

translation.en: -That's an order. -I give my team orders.
translation.zh: -这是命令 -我的团队只听命于我

translation.en: And I give you orders. How the fuck do you not get that by now?
translation.zh: 而你得听命于我 你怎么到现在还不明白？

translation.en: -Twenty seconds. -[Chad] Come on, Winters.
translation.zh: -还剩20秒 -拜托了 温特斯

translation.en: We're supposed to stop the bad guy, not sit here while he blows up Vegas.
translation.zh: 我们是来阻止坏人的 而不是来坐等他炸掉拉斯维加斯的

translation.en: He's not blowing up Vegas. At least not until he's miles away.
translation.zh: 他不会炸掉拉斯维加斯的 至少在他离开这里几公里之前不会

translation.en: -How can you be sure? -It's my job to be sure.
translation.zh: -你怎么那么有把握？ -我的工作就是把握一切

translation.en: -Ten seconds. -Am I going hot or not?
translation.zh: -还剩10秒 -我到底要不要开枪？

translation.en: Do not take that shot. He's a businessman. Not a suicide bomber.
translation.zh: 别开枪 他是个商人 不是自杀式炸弹袭击者

translation.en: Five, four, three…
translation.zh: 五、四、三…

translation.en: -Wait! -[firecrackers exploding]
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: [Maya] The signal's tied to the DJ booth.
translation.zh: 信号是连着DJ台的

translation.en: They must have rigged pyro for the show.
translation.zh: 他们一定是为表演安排了烟火

translation.en: You don't say.
translation.zh: 真想不到

translation.en: Told you.
translation.zh: 我都说了

translation.en: Sorry, team. Tech's a little oversensitive.
translation.zh: 对不起 各位 技术人员有点过于敏感了

translation.en: Don't sweat it, Tech Chick. We all make mistakes.
translation.zh: 别担心 科技妹 谁都会犯错

translation.en: God didn't when he made those abs.
translation.zh: 上帝创造那些腹肌时并没有犯错

translation.en: This team can't afford to make mistakes. Tighten up.
translation.zh: 这个团队不能犯错 加强把关

translation.en: Yes, ma'am. Roger that. Sorry.
translation.zh: 好的 长官 收到了 对不起

translation.en: I'm going in.
translation.zh: 我要过去了

translation.en: You got out of the water. Warm and cozy.
translation.zh: 你从水里出来了 既温暖又舒适

translation.en: There she is. The jewel of Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 她来了 拉斯维加斯的宝石

translation.en: [in Russian] My edges are too soft to be a jewel.
translation.zh: 我的棱角太柔和了 不适合做宝石

translation.en: [chuckles] Your Russian is flawless. Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你的俄语真流利 你是哪里人？

translation.en: Kalamazoo, Michigan. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 密歇根州卡拉马祖

translation.en: [in Russian] My aunt's from the Zamoskvorechye district, in Moscow.
translation.zh: 我有个来自莫斯科 扎莫斯克沃雷切区的阿姨

translation.en: That explains how your beauty stands out here.
translation.zh: 难怪你的美貌如此出众

translation.en: If you wanna get away, I'm leaving on my jet tonight.
translation.zh: 如果你想出去休假几天 我今晚会坐飞机离开

translation.en: [in English] Where'd we be going?
translation.zh: 我们准备去哪里？

translation.en: Well, that would take the mystery away.
translation.zh: 说出来就不神秘了

translation.en: Let's just say you'll be better off with me than staying here.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 你跟我一起走 肯定会比待在这里好

translation.en: Why do you say that?
translation.zh: 为什么这么说？

translation.en: Something tells me that tonight the city's going to be dead.
translation.zh: 直觉告诉我 这座城市今晚就要毁灭了

translation.en: Here, give me your number. I'll call you when I'm ready to leave.
translation.zh: 来吧 把你的号码给我 我准备走的时候给你打电话

translation.en: Don't tell. I could get fired.
translation.zh: 别说出去 我可能会被解雇的

translation.en: Your secret is safe with me.
translation.zh: 我会守口如瓶的

translation.en: [in Russian] Hey, boss…
translation.zh: 嘿 老板…

translation.en: Our guests have arrived and are ready to eat.
translation.zh: 我们的客人已经到了 现在准备开餐了

translation.en: They are waiting for you. [in Russian] Let them wait, it's only appetizers.
translation.zh: -他们在等你 -让他们等吧 只是开胃菜而已

translation.en: I'll be on time for the main course.
translation.zh: 等上主菜时 我会准时到的

translation.en: You guys are no fun.
translation.zh: 你们真没意思

translation.en: [in English] I must go. I'll see you tonight. Definitely.
translation.zh: -我得走了 今晚见 -那是肯定的

translation.en: Georgie!
translation.zh: 乔吉！

translation.en: This is it. Koslov's meeting the buyers.
translation.zh: 好了 科索沃要去见买家了

translation.en: Gomez, rendezvous out front. Full tactical pursuit.
translation.zh: 戈麦斯 在前面集合 全力追击

translation.en: No. He feels our surveillance we'll lose him.
translation.zh: 不 如果他察觉到我们在监视他 并奔向沙漠 我们就失去线索了

translation.en: Ivan may be wild, but he's not reckless.
translation.zh: 艾凡也许狂野 但他并不鲁莽

translation.en: -So, we sit here and do nothing? -I didn't say we do nothing.
translation.zh: -所以我们要在这里坐以待毙吗？ -我没说要坐以待毙

translation.en: Get the vulture.
translation.zh: 把直升机叫来

translation.en: Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [in English] Whole gang is here, huh?
translation.zh: 大家都来了

translation.en: Apologies for my delay.
translation.zh: 抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: Wanted to do the last dance with Las Vegas before the party is over.
translation.zh: 想着在派对结束前 和拉斯维加斯跳最后一支舞

translation.en: Huh? A thing of beauty, isn't it?
translation.zh: 很漂亮 对吧？

translation.en: -Five kilotons of destructive power. -[device clicking]
translation.zh: 五千吨的破坏力

translation.en: Enough to level the city,
translation.zh: 足以夷平整座城市

translation.en: and also compact enough to fit in the trunk of your car.
translation.zh: 而且体积也小到 可以装进汽车的后备箱

translation.en: Mobile, undetectable.
translation.zh: 既便携又不会被发现

translation.en: All you have to do is set the timer and fly away.
translation.zh: 你们只需要设好计时器 然后坐飞机离开

translation.en: And in a few hours, the city goes…
translation.zh: 几个小时后 这座城市就会…

translation.en: In a mushroom cloud.
translation.zh: 在蘑菇云里

translation.en: It's the real deal.
translation.zh: 是真货

translation.en: -[man] The security's in your account. -Wonderful. Let's celebrate!
translation.zh: -定金已经转到你账户里了 -太好了 我们来庆祝一下吧！

translation.en: And remember our arrangement.
translation.zh: 还有记住我们的约定

translation.en: Do not press the button until our plane is 20,000 feet up in the air.
translation.zh: 在我们的飞机升到 六千公尺高之前 不要按下按钮

translation.en: We'll wait till your flight attendant has served drinks.
translation.zh: 我们会等到你的空乘人员端上饮料

translation.en: No, she prefers "stewardess." Pleasure doing business with you.
translation.zh: 不 她比较喜欢“空姐”这个称呼 很高兴能和你们做生意

translation.en: This is the United States Military. Everyone put your hands on your heads.
translation.zh: 这是美国军队 所有人都把手放在头上

translation.en: [in Russian] Bitch!
translation.zh: 臭婊子！

translation.en: Guess we're doing it the hard way.
translation.zh: 看来我们得来硬的了

translation.en: Vulture's going hot.
translation.zh: 直升机要发射了

translation.en: Canister deployed. It's all yours, McKnight.
translation.zh: 催泪弹已发射 交给你了 麦克奈特

translation.en: Limit your fire. Winters wants these fuckers alive.
translation.zh: 限制你们的火力 温特斯要活捉这些混蛋

translation.en: [in Russian] Kill them all, bitch!
translation.zh: 把他们全部干掉 贱人！

translation.en: Change of plans! Take 'em all down!
translation.zh: 计划有变！杀他们个片甲不留！

translation.en: Get down.
translation.zh: 蹲下

translation.en: -Heads or tails? -Heads.
translation.zh: -头还是尾？ -头

translation.en: -Nice work. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -干得好 -没错

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Motherfucker.
translation.zh: 王八蛋

translation.en: Take him.
translation.zh: 把他拿下

translation.en: -I'm out. Toss me a mag. -What? No thank you?
translation.zh: -我没子弹了 给我一个弹夹 -什么？连谢都不谢一声？

translation.en: [Trunk over comms] East wing clear. Check the back room.
translation.zh: 东翼搞定了 检查一下后面的房间

translation.en: [Chad] Winters.
translation.zh: 温特斯

translation.en: [Ava] It's Koslov. He has the nuke.
translation.zh: 是科索沃 核弹在他手上

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 他妈的

translation.en: Gomez. Little help?
translation.zh: 戈麦斯 可以帮个忙吗？

translation.en: -No shot. Hang tight a minute. -We don't have a minute.
translation.zh: -还没有机会 再等一会 -我们没时间了

translation.en: It's a figure of speech.
translation.zh: 这只是修辞手法

translation.en: Three, two, one, bedtime.
translation.zh: 三、二、一 睡觉了

translation.en: [Angela] All clear.
translation.zh: 全都搞定了

translation.en: You got that right.
translation.zh: 你这枪太神了

translation.en: [Ava] He's in one of these rooms.
translation.zh: 他就在其中一个房间里

translation.en: [Chad] Clear!
translation.zh: 没人！

translation.en: [Chad] What the fuck?
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: -Please don't kill me. -We're the US Government.
translation.zh: -请不要杀我 -我们是美国政府

translation.en: -You're okay. -Looks like someone had a party.
translation.zh: -你没事了 -看来有人在这里开了个派对

translation.en: None of that's mine. I've just been hooking up with this guy.
translation.zh: 不 那些都不是我的 我只是和一个男人在一起

translation.en: I don't know if he's a drug dealer. I don't do that shit. Like, usually.
translation.zh: 我不知道他是不是毒贩 我不吸毒 通常不吸

translation.en: Relax. We're gonna get you someplace safe. You just sit tight.
translation.zh: 放轻松 我们会带你去安全的地方 你在这里等等吧

translation.en: Wait. You're leaving me here?
translation.zh: 等等 你们要把我扔在这里？

translation.en: [Chad] He must be in here.
translation.zh: 他一定在里面

translation.en: We have him cornered.
translation.zh: 他被我们包围了

translation.en: -He could have an army in there. -Bring 'em on.
translation.zh: -里面可能有一支军队等着我们 -放马过来吧

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: This is a vault room.
translation.zh: 这是个保险库

translation.en: The door's made of reinforced steel. You'll break your leg.
translation.zh: 门是钢筋做的 你的腿会断掉

translation.en: Lerner. We have a secure door. Electronic lock. Can you open it remotely?
translation.zh: 勒纳 这里有一扇安全门 用的是电子锁 你能远程打开吗？

translation.en: You bet. Hang on.
translation.zh: 没问题 稍等

translation.en: Just finding the right frequency.
translation.zh: 只要找到正确的频率

translation.en: -Find it faster. -Yes, ma'am. That should do it.
translation.zh: -动作快点 -是的 长官 应该可以了

translation.en: -[door unlocks] -You're the tits, Tech Chick.
translation.zh: 你太屌了 科技妹

translation.en: I'm the tits.
translation.zh: 我很屌

translation.en: Back away from the bomb. It's over.
translation.zh: 离炸弹远点 一切都结束了

translation.en: Mmm. My little Jewel of Las Vegas. Well, this is where you are wrong.
translation.zh: 我的拉斯维加斯小宝贝 这你就错了

translation.en: I've activated the weapon.
translation.zh: 我已经启动了武器

translation.en: You didn't come this far to go down with the ship.
translation.zh: 你大费周章地走到这一步 不是为了陪葬的

translation.en: No, I didn't.
translation.zh: 不 当然不是

translation.en: But if there is no ship, what's the point of treading water?
translation.zh: 但如果已经走投无路了 我还在乎什么呢？

translation.en: He's not bluffing. Your bomb tech as good as they say he is?
translation.zh: 他不是在虚张声势 你的炸弹专家 有他们说的那么厉害吗？

translation.en: Best in the business.
translation.zh: 他是业内的佼佼者

translation.en: He better be.
translation.zh: 他最好是

translation.en: [Chad] Two more!
translation.zh: 再来两个伙计！

translation.en: Get me Hagerty.
translation.zh: 把哈格蒂叫来

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Let's see this bitch.
translation.zh: 来看看这个家伙吧

translation.en: [Hagerty] Looks like we got a little time.
translation.zh: 看来我们还有一点时间

translation.en: [exhales deeply] This puppy's hot.
translation.zh: 这个宝贝真性感

translation.en: -Detectable C-4. PETN fuse. -[liquid bubbling]
translation.zh: C-4电路 融合了分子经验电子理论

translation.en: This thing's a beaut.
translation.zh: 真是个漂亮的东西

translation.en: Anybody else getting a half chub?
translation.zh: 还有谁开始硬了吗？

translation.en: -What's he doing? -He's looking for a perfect song.
translation.zh: -他在干什么？ -他在找一首合适的歌

translation.en: All bomb guys are weirdos, but trust me, he's an artist.
translation.zh: 所有研究炸弹的人都是怪胎 但相信我 他是个艺术家

translation.en: Just let him do his thing.
translation.zh: 让他按自己的方式来就好

translation.en: Will you find a song already?
translation.zh: 你快点找首歌不行吗？

translation.en: Just relax, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 放松点 亲爱的

translation.en: Okay, the whole key to this is just to forget that there's a clock at all.
translation.zh: 好吧 关键在于 完全忽略计时器的存在

translation.en: So? There's no clock.
translation.zh: 所以？计时器不存在

translation.en: There is no--
translation.zh: 计时器不存…

translation.en: ["Feeling Good" by Michael Bublé playing] ♪ Birds flying high ♪
translation.zh: 群鸟高飞

translation.en: ♪ You know how I feel ♪
translation.zh: 你知道我的感受

translation.en: ♪ Sun in the sky ♪
translation.zh: 艳阳当空

translation.en: ♪ You know how I feel ♪
translation.zh: 你知道我的感受

translation.en: ♪ Breeze driftin' on by ♪
translation.zh: 微风飘过

translation.en: ♪ You know how I feel ♪
translation.zh: 你知道我的感受

translation.en: ♪ It's a new dawn ♪
translation.zh: 对我来说

translation.en: ♪ It's a new day ♪
translation.zh: 这是新的黎明

translation.en: ♪ It's a new life ♪
translation.zh: 新的一天

translation.en: -♪ For me ♪ -♪ For me ♪
translation.zh: -新的生活 -新的生活

translation.en: -♪ And I'm feeling good ♪ -♪ And I'm feeling good ♪
translation.zh: -而我感觉良好 -而我感觉良好

translation.en: -♪ I'm feeling good ♪ -♪ I'm feeling good ♪
translation.zh: -我感觉良好 -我感觉良好

translation.en: Who has one thumb and just saved Las Vegas?
translation.zh: 谁用一个拇指拯救了拉斯维加斯？

translation.en: This guy!
translation.zh: 就是这个男人！

translation.en: That motherfucker!
translation.zh: 就是那个王八蛋！

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yes!
translation.zh: -没错！ -对！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: -Fuck yeah! Yeah! -[yells excitedly]
translation.zh: 太棒了！好耶！

translation.en: [chanting] USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国！

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -耶！ -好耶！

translation.en: [Hagerty] Yes, baby!
translation.zh: 是的 宝贝！

translation.en: -Great work. -[Maya] Thank you.
translation.zh: -干得好 -谢谢

translation.en: [Chad] Look at this motherfucker. Goddamn.
translation.zh: 看看那个王八蛋 该死的

translation.en: Oh, man. Koslov's in custody. Bomb deactivated. Crisis averted.
translation.zh: 天啊 科索沃被拘留了 炸弹也拆除了 危机已解除

translation.en: This town should throw us a goddamn ticker-tape parade.
translation.zh: 这个镇子应该 为我们办一场盛大的游行

translation.en: That was quick.
translation.zh: 这也太快了吧

translation.en: Ladies, you wanna meet a real American…
translation.zh: 女士们 你们想见见真正的美国…

translation.en: hero?
translation.zh: 英雄？

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: A DJ? You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 一个DJ？不是吧

translation.en: We just saved the world and this candy ass gets all the love?
translation.zh: 我们刚刚拯救了世界 但受人爱戴的却是那个小屁孩？

translation.en: -[Trunk] Candy ass. -That's the world we live in, yo.
translation.zh: -小屁孩 -这就是我们生活的世界

translation.en: Had we streamed our take down on TikTok, we'd be trending.
translation.zh: 要是我们刚才在TikTok 直播我们的行动 我们就火了

translation.en: No one's ever gonna know what we did.
translation.zh: 不会有人知道我们做了什么

translation.en: Because until all this is declassified, today never happened.
translation.zh: 因为在这一切解密之前 今天的事都没发生过

translation.en: So, what now?
translation.zh: 那么 我们现在要做什么？

translation.en: Mission's over. We go back to the hotel, pack up.
translation.zh: 任务结束了 我们回酒店去收拾行李

translation.en: I ship off to Langley, you to Fort Meade, everyone else to their respective bases.
translation.zh: 我回兰利 你回米德堡 其他人都回到各自的基地去

translation.en: We disband and await word of our next assignments.
translation.zh: 我们先解散 然后等待下一个任务的通知

translation.en: No. Whoa! Wait, wait, wait.
translation.zh: 不 等等

translation.en: Fuck that.
translation.zh: 我不干

translation.en: We spent months hunting this son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 我们花了好几个月来追捕这个混蛋

translation.en: We finally nabbed the nuke, we fuck up his whole program,
translation.zh: 我们终于拿到了核弹 还毁了他的整个计划

translation.en: and we're supposed to just quietly go our own separate ways?
translation.zh: 结果我们却要悄悄地分道扬镳

translation.en: We're in Las Vegas, the party capital of the world.
translation.zh: 我们现在身处于 世界的派对之都拉斯维加斯

translation.en: And if the world knew what we did here today,
translation.zh: 如果世人知道 我们今天在这里做了什么

translation.en: they'd want us to party like the rock stars we are.
translation.zh: 他们会希望我们像摇滚明星一样狂欢

translation.en: Fuck! They'd demand it.
translation.zh: 妈的！他们会要求我们这么做

translation.en: -Fuckin' A, they would. -Fuck yeah.
translation.zh: -没错 他们一定会 -毫无疑问

translation.en: 2200 hours.
translation.zh: 晚上10点钟

translation.en: Details TBD, but hear me when I say this.
translation.zh: 细节待定 但是给我听清楚了

translation.en: I am going to empty every cent that's left in our operational war chest.
translation.zh: 我要把我们作战基金里 剩下的每一分钱都花光

translation.en: Because tonight…
translation.zh: 因为今晚…

translation.en: we're gonna show this town how to celebrate real American heroes.
translation.zh: 我们要向这个小镇展示 如何为真正的美国英雄庆祝

translation.en: -Fuck yeah! Yeah! -Hell yeah!
translation.zh: -必须的！没错！ -没错！

translation.en: -Let's do it! -[Angela] Yeah!
translation.zh: -就这么办吧！ -对！

translation.en: Everyone's invited.
translation.zh: 谁都可以来

translation.en: -Ready to get fucked up? -Ready to get fucked…
translation.zh: -准备好大搞一场了吗？ -准备好大搞…

translation.en: up.
translation.zh: 一场了

translation.en: What do you say, Winters? Send your regrets now or ghost us later?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样 温特斯？ 你要现在就拒绝 还是迟点玩消失？

translation.en: I'll get back to you.
translation.zh: 我想想再回复你

translation.en: Copy. We won't hold our breath.
translation.zh: 收到 我们一点都不期待

translation.en: [man] Ava Winters.
translation.zh: 艾娃·温特斯

translation.en: -Will you be my wife? -[Ava] I can't believe this is happening.
translation.zh: -你愿意成为我的妻子吗？ -我不敢相信这是真的

translation.en: Good evening, sir.
translation.zh: 晚上好 长官

translation.en: Good is an understatement.
translation.zh: 何止是“好”

translation.en: I'd call it a pretty damn fantastic evening.
translation.zh: 我觉得今晚简直妙不可言

translation.en: When you work in our field, the stakes are always high, but today…
translation.zh: 做我们这一行 风险总是很高 但是今天的行动…

translation.en: that was historic.
translation.zh: 简直是历史性的成功

translation.en: Would have preferred things neater. The buyer wasn't on our radar.
translation.zh: 要是能处理得更有条有序就好了 我们忽略了买家

translation.en: He's this Swedish blockchain entrepreneur, who thought he could skyrocket his crypto
translation.zh: 他是一个瑞典区块链企业家 他认为他可以通过摧毁

translation.en: by destroying a massive amount of American currency.
translation.zh: 大量的美国货币 来让他的加密货币价值飙升

translation.en: Guy sees one Bond film and thinks he can be the next Max Zorin.
translation.zh: 那家伙看了一部邦德电影就觉得 自己能成为下一个麦克斯·佐林

translation.en: I'll be on a flight in the morning. I want to discuss something.
translation.zh: 我明早会搭第一班机回去 我有事想和你谈谈

translation.en: -Winters, no. -You haven't even heard the brief, sir.
translation.zh: -温特斯 不必了 -我还没开始说呢 长官

translation.en: This mission went longer than you or I could have predicted.
translation.zh: 这次的任务比你我预期的要长

translation.en: You never had a chance to grieve.
translation.zh: 你根本没有机会好好哀悼

translation.en: -I'm fine, sir. -You're taking some time.
translation.zh: -我没事 长官 -你得休息一段时间

translation.en: The world will still have plenty of trash to take out when you return.
translation.zh: 我保证 等你回来时 这世界仍然有很多垃圾需要处理

translation.en: He would've been proud of you.
translation.zh: 他会为你感到骄傲的

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Did you get the President's gift?
translation.zh: 你收到总统的礼物了吗？

translation.en: Yes. Thank you. It's very generous, sir.
translation.zh: 收到了 谢谢 那是一份厚礼 长官

translation.en: Pop it open. You're officially on vacation. Enjoy it.
translation.zh: 把它打开 你正式放假了 好好享受吧

translation.en: ♪ Shake my ass, no stopping it… ♪
translation.zh: （威尼斯人酒店）

translation.en: ♪ I look hot in it, hot in it I look hot in it… ♪
translation.zh: （这就是在拉斯维加斯发生的事）

translation.en: [Chad] Yes, Trunky!
translation.zh: （这就是在拉斯维加斯发生的事） 太好了 小特！

translation.en: You got my end of mission gift! Fits good!
translation.zh: 你收到了我的任务结束礼物！ 很合身！

translation.en: Like a glove! Thanks, chief.
translation.zh: 合身极了！谢了 队长

translation.en: Almost forgot. I got something for you, too. I hope it fits.
translation.zh: 差点忘了 我也有礼物要给你 希望你能用上

translation.en: Gracias, this is…
translation.zh: 谢谢 这是…

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Mmm. You crack it like a chem light. Glows in the dark, can't miss any action.
translation.zh: 只要像荧光棒那样掰一掰 它就会 在黑暗中发光 你不会错过任何动作

translation.en: -Beat you to death with it. -Watch the face.
translation.zh: -我要用它来打死你 -小心我的脸

translation.en: That is not what it's used for. I seen some films showing its proper use.
translation.zh: 这东西不是这么用的 我看了介绍短片上的使用方法

translation.en: I'll send you the link. But now for your real gifts.
translation.zh: 我会把链接发给你 但现在 你们真正的礼物来了

translation.en: Fucking drugs. Purest MDMA in the city.
translation.zh: 该死的毒品 城里最纯的摇头丸

translation.en: Knight, I already got gummies in me. Shouldn't add Molly to the mix.
translation.zh: 奈特 我已经吃了大麻软糖 不应该再吃摇头丸了

translation.en: Molly's a good girl. She doesn't wanna fuck with gummies.
translation.zh: 摇头丸是个好东西 它和大麻软糖没有冲突

translation.en: She just makes 'em dance like no one's watching.
translation.zh: 它只会让人若无旁人般地舞动起来

translation.en: Fuck it, I'm in.
translation.zh: 管他的 我拼了

translation.en: -[Angela] You are. -Yes.
translation.zh: -这就对了 -没错

translation.en: -[waiter] Here ya go. -Here we go.
translation.zh: -这是你们的酒 -我们的酒来了

translation.en: -Gracias. Great. -Uno mas.
translation.zh: -谢谢 太好了 -还有一杯

translation.en: To bad guys and bad bitches.
translation.zh: 敬坏人和坏女人

translation.en: Beware when the three of us are on the prowl, you're going down.
translation.zh: 遇到我们三个上岗时要小心 你们要完蛋了

translation.en: Yo, someone's going down. That's for sure.
translation.zh: 有人会完蛋 这是肯定的

translation.en: Yo, Mac, there's something I've been meaning to talk to you about.
translation.zh: 麦克 有件事我一直都想和你谈谈

translation.en: Kind of personal.
translation.zh: 挺私人的

translation.en: Alpha Sierra Sierra, twelve o'clock, pillow princess in the crosshairs.
translation.zh: 12点钟方向有新目标 已瞄准枕头公主

translation.en: Oh! Bachelorette party. Nice.
translation.zh: 女子单身派对 太棒了

translation.en: [Angela] Tiara's mine.
translation.zh: 戴王冠那个是我的

translation.en: [Trunk] The bride? Groom won't appreciate that too much.
translation.zh: 你是指新娘吗？新郎应该会不高兴的

translation.en: [Angela] It's like in the field. Target's in your sights,
translation.zh: 这就像在战场上 你看见了目标

translation.en: forget their personal lives, or lose your nerve.
translation.zh: 别管他们的私生活 否则你就会临阵退缩

translation.en: Goddamn you're cold-blooded.
translation.zh: 该死的 你真冷血

translation.en: She's all yours.
translation.zh: 她是你的了

translation.en: All right, so there's two, four, six, seven.
translation.zh: 好了 那里有二、四、六、七

translation.en: -Yeah. Trunk and I'll divvy up the rest. -Agreed. Engage targets, y'all.
translation.zh: -好的 剩下的我和特兰克分 -赞同 开始进攻吧 伙计们

translation.en: Let's do it. Hey, you in? We'll talk about that thing later?
translation.zh: 走吧 嘿 你要一起来吗？ 我们可以迟点再谈那件事吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Let's have some fun. Let's do it.
translation.zh: 好的 我们去找点乐子吧 走

translation.en: [Paul] Honey, death lurks around every street corner.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 每个街角都潜伏着死亡危机

translation.en: No, I'm not being overdramatic.
translation.zh: 不 我没有夸张

translation.en: Prom night is the most dangerous night for teenage drinking and driving.
translation.zh: 舞会之夜是青少年酒驾最危险的夜晚

translation.en: Make sure Jen has a limo, a driver without a record,
translation.zh: 确保珍来回都搭豪华轿车 而且司机没有犯罪记录

translation.en: and to be home before midnight.
translation.zh: 还有让她在午夜前回家

translation.en: Honey. That's not fair. You know I wanted to be there.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你这么说不公平 你知道我也想回家

translation.en: This mission was important.
translation.zh: 但这次的任务很重要

translation.en: What? No, of course, I'm not saying our daughter's not important. What the…
translation.zh: 什么？不 我当然不是说 我们的女儿不重要 什么…

translation.en: Hey, Paul's wife, Chad McKnight here.
translation.zh: 喂 保罗的太太 我是查德·麦克奈特

translation.en: I just want to say your husband was a real hero today.
translation.zh: 我只想说你丈夫今天是个真正的英雄

translation.en: He did some crazy shit.
translation.zh: 他做了一些疯狂的事

translation.en: Why don't we cut the guy some slack, let him have some fun, huh?
translation.zh: 要不我们就放他一马 让他放松一下吧？

translation.en: Maybe a couple of lap dances. Handy at most.
translation.zh: 也许就跳几支大腿舞 顶多也是手淫

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: She hung up. Fuck, dude.
translation.zh: 她挂了电话 该死的 伙计

translation.en: -Thanks a lot. -She'll forgive you.
translation.zh: -太感谢了 -她会原谅你的

translation.en: -Stop stressing, have a drink. -I don't drink.
translation.zh: -别紧张 过来喝几杯吧 -你知道我不喝酒

translation.en: -Maybe that's your problem. -Right.
translation.zh: -也许那就是你的问题 -没错

translation.en: Gotta loosen the fuck up.
translation.zh: 你得他妈的放松点

translation.en: Great! Now I'm drenched.
translation.zh: 太好了！现在我浑身湿透了

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也湿透了

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Heard you liked to live large, Koslov.
translation.zh: 听说你喜欢奢华的生活 科索沃

translation.en: -I made sure to give you our best suite. -Charming.
translation.zh: -我给你安排了这里最好的套房 -好极了

translation.en: Do you happen to know the time?
translation.zh: 你知道现在几点了吗？

translation.en: Time no longer exists for you. You'll never see the light of day again.
translation.zh: 时间对你来说已经不存在了 你再也见不到天日了

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.zh: 我可不敢如此妄断

translation.en: I must be starting to trip balls because I see Winters.
translation.zh: 我一定是开始出现幻觉了 因为我看见温特斯了

translation.en: [Trunk] Nope, I see her too.
translation.zh: 不 我也看见她了

translation.en: Well, well, well.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Looks like the lone wolf's come to join the pack. Bud Heavy?
translation.zh: 看来独狼要加入狼群了 要来一瓶百威啤酒吗？

translation.en: How the hell did you pull this together on a few hours' notice?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么在短短几个小时 把这个派对搞定的？

translation.en: My inexhaustible resourcefulness.
translation.zh: 就凭我取之不尽的足智多谋

translation.en: That and Uncle Sam's dime buys you a lot of Vegas goodwill.
translation.zh: 再加上美金 就能让你在拉斯维加斯人见人爱

translation.en: -[animal grunts] -Have you met Joey?
translation.zh: 你见过乔伊了吗？

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -I rented him from the Tiger King.
translation.zh: -我的天啊 -我从虎王那里租来的

translation.en: Not the one in jail. I'm not an asshole. The new one.
translation.zh: 不是在监狱里那个 我不是混蛋 而是新的那个

translation.en: He said not to spook him though, these things run like the wind. Don't ya?
translation.zh: 不过他说不要吓到它 这家伙跑得像风一样快 不是吗？

translation.en: -You're a fucking idiot. -[Chad] My teachers used to say that.
translation.zh: -你他妈是个白痴 -我的老师过去常这么说

translation.en: -Is Hagerty doing cocaine? -Fuck, no. It's Adderall and ketamine.
translation.zh: -哈格蒂是在吸可卡因？ -当然不是 这是阿得拉和氯胺酮

translation.en: With a horse tranq garnish and a whipp-ed chaser.
translation.zh: 加上马用镇定剂和灌装奶油

translation.en: Don't you guys get tested?
translation.zh: 你们都不用做毒品检测吗？

translation.en: You know how easy it is to get clean piss? This is America.
translation.zh: 你知道要把尿弄干净有多简单吗？ 这里是美国

translation.en: In that case, keep clean pissing your career away.
translation.zh: 既然如此 那就让你的尿保持干净 以免毁了你的事业

translation.en: Come on, Winters. You didn't come here to be the fun police.
translation.zh: 拜托了 温特斯 你不是来当搞笑警察的

translation.en: Hey, take a cue from Tech Chick. Tech Chick came here to party, right?
translation.zh: 学一学科技妹吧 科技妹是来参加派对的 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Party time.
translation.zh: 对 这是派对时间

translation.en: Her name isn't Tech Chick.
translation.zh: 她不叫科技妹

translation.en: Her name is Maya Lerner. She's been on our team for six months.
translation.zh: 她叫玛雅·勒纳 加入我们团队已经半年了

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine with Tech Chick. Or anything you want to call me.
translation.zh: 叫我科技妹也没关系 或者你想叫我什么都行

translation.en: See? Tech Chick gets it! Love you!
translation.zh: 看吧？科技妹懂幽默感！爱你！

translation.en: Fuck him. G.I. Jerk-Off wouldn't know his ass from a hole in the ground
translation.zh: 去他的 如果不是我们 这个混蛋大兵在这次任务中

translation.en: on this mission if it weren't for us.
translation.zh: 连个屁都不知道

translation.en: -Lerner, I need your help with something. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -勒纳 我需要你帮我个忙 -好的 长官

translation.en: I brought my laptop. "Don't leave home without it."
translation.zh: 我把笔记本电脑带来了 “出门一定要带上它”

translation.en: Forget work. I need you to help me polish this off.
translation.zh: 先把工作放在一旁 我需要你帮我把这瓶酒喝完

translation.en: You want to drink? With me?
translation.zh: 你想和我一起喝酒？

translation.en: -Come on. It's our turn to party. -Okay.
translation.zh: -来吧 轮到我们开派对了 -好吧

translation.en: Fuck it!
translation.zh: 尽情狂欢吧！

translation.en: You want to melt those pretty minds of yours?
translation.zh: 你们想融化那美丽的小脑袋吗？

translation.en: Psilocybe azurescens,
translation.zh: 深蓝裸盖菇

translation.en: otherwise known as flying saucer mushrooms.
translation.zh: 也就是所谓的飞碟菇

translation.en: Infused with military-grade lysergic acid diethylamide.
translation.zh: 注入了军用级的麦角酸二乙基酰胺

translation.en: Yeah, you won't be needing this tonight.
translation.zh: 好吧 你今晚不需要这个了

translation.en: What the hell. It's a party, right? A little pineapple, mixed with guacamole.
translation.zh: 管他的 这是个派对 对吧？ 来点菠萝 拌上鳄梨酱

translation.en: -Are you feeling it? -Oh, I'm feeling it. You feeling it?
translation.zh: -你感觉到了吗？ -我感觉到了 你呢？

translation.en: Oh, I'm definitely feeling it.
translation.zh: 我百分百感觉到了

translation.en: Measuring U-235 isotope.
translation.zh: 正在测量U-235同位素

translation.en: That's odd.
translation.zh: 太奇怪了

translation.en: This can't be right. We need to take this to the top. Where's Hagerty?
translation.zh: （U-235同位素 达到或低于安全水平） 这不对 必须向高层报告 哈格蒂在哪里？

translation.en: That is dope.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Yunga! What's going on, kid?
translation.zh: 阿容！怎么了 小子？

translation.en: Ladies, I want you to meet my bestie in the whole wide world.
translation.zh: 女士们 让我给你们介绍 我在这个世界上最好的朋友

translation.en: This is Captain Paul Yung, USAF,
translation.zh: 这是美国空军的保罗·容上尉

translation.en: which stands for "U Silly As Fuck."
translation.zh: 绰号是“你真他妈傻”

translation.en: Get off your phone and come join the party.
translation.zh: 你什么时候才能放下手机 一起狂欢？

translation.en: Hey. There's going to be some water sports here.
translation.zh: 嘿 这里将会有一些水上运动

translation.en: You want to get in on this?
translation.zh: 你想加入吗？

translation.en: You know I'm married.
translation.zh: 你也知道我是已婚人士

translation.en: And that's why I'm asking you, Paul. You need this so goddamn bad.
translation.zh: 所以我才问你 保罗 你真的很需要放纵一下

translation.en: But suit yourself. Okay?
translation.zh: 不过随你便 好吧？

translation.en: Now go try that guacamole over there. It's the goddamn bomb.
translation.zh: 现在去尝尝那边的鳄梨酱吧 那是好东西

translation.en: You're a fucking genius.
translation.zh: 你他妈是个天才

translation.en: You're the youngest recruit the NSA's ever had.
translation.zh: 你是国安局最年轻的新兵

translation.en: Yeah. And I spend most of my time in a dark van decrypting code.
translation.zh: 是的 而我大部分时间 都待在一辆昏暗的面包车里解密代码

translation.en: And then I go out in the real world and I'm clueless.
translation.zh: 然后我走入现实世界时 却发现自己毫无头绪

translation.en: -We're all fucking clueless. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 我们都他妈的毫无头绪

translation.en: But then, I look at you and I see the ultimate badass.
translation.zh: 但是 在我眼中 你是个完美的强者

translation.en: -Stop! -You're smart. You're sexy.
translation.zh: -别说了！ -你很聪明、很性感

translation.en: You don't shit from anyone. You're a fucking boss.
translation.zh: 你不在乎别人怎么想 我行我素

translation.en: How did you find that confidence?
translation.zh: 你是怎么找到这种自信的？

translation.en: At some point, I guess I realized…
translation.zh: 在某种程度上 我想我发现…

translation.en: if you want things to be a certain way, you can't depend on fate or luck.
translation.zh: 如果你想让事情按照某个方向发展 你不能依靠命运或运气

translation.en: Just gotta step up. Make it happen yourself.
translation.zh: 你必须靠自己的努力去实现

translation.en: [Chad] Let's do this.
translation.zh: 我们开始吧

translation.en: -Grease him up! -Ah! All biceps, no brains.
translation.zh: -给他上油！ -空有一身肌肉的无脑之人

translation.en: I've got enough brains.
translation.zh: 我的脑已经够用了

translation.en: Oh! Part the sea!
translation.zh: 给我们腾出地方！

translation.en: Come on, we're fun.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们去看热闹

translation.en: -[Chad] Back it up! -[growls]
translation.zh: 往后退！

translation.en: Oh! That is good.
translation.zh: 真好吃

translation.en: -[Chad] Ready, big boy? -Yeah!

translation.en: The lab report on the bomb you retrieved showed only traces of isotopic uranium.
translation.zh: 实验室的报告指出你们缴获的炸弹 只含有微量的同位素铀

translation.en: Just enough to be detected, but not enough for an explosion.
translation.zh: 刚好能被检测到 但不足以引发爆炸

translation.en: Highly sophisticated copy.
translation.zh: 那是尖端复制品

translation.en: That means someone working for Koslov still has the mother lode.
translation.zh: 也就是说大部分的铀 还在科索沃的手下那里

translation.en: The lab has been trying to get in touch with your EOD. Is he there with you?
translation.zh: 实验室一直在尝试 联系你们的拆弹专家 他在那里吗？

translation.en: -Hagerty's here. -Good.
translation.zh: -哈格蒂在这里 -很好

translation.en: We're gonna need his magic if this turns out to be as bad as we…
translation.zh: 如果结果像我们想的一样糟的话 我们还需要他的鬼斧神工…

translation.en: Wait. What is that?
translation.zh: 等等 那是什么？

translation.en: Sorry, someone moved a camel. Statue.
translation.zh: 不好意思 有人把骆驼雕像移过来了

translation.en: Look, Winters, I know tonight was supposed to be a celebration.
translation.zh: 听着 温特斯 我知道今晚本来应该庆祝一番的

translation.en: But as we all know, in our line of work, we're always on call.
translation.zh: 但我们都知道 在我们这一行 我们必须随传随到

translation.en: I assume your team celebrated responsibly, and nobody took things too far.
translation.zh: 所以我想你们是带着责任感庆祝的 没有人做得太过分

translation.en: No, sir, we all celerated… Celebrated responsibly.
translation.zh: 没有 长官 我们是带着… 我们是带着责任感庆祝的

translation.en: I just want to know, is your team ready to get back into this?
translation.zh: 我只想知道你的团队 是否能继续执行这个任务？

translation.en: -[softly] Fuck. No. -[Angela] Mmm.
translation.zh: 当然不能

translation.en: Sir…
translation.zh: 长官…

translation.en: Ready as a dog in heat, sir.
translation.zh: 我们已经整装待发了 长官

translation.en: That's what I like to hear. Ball's in your court.
translation.zh: 这就是我想听到的 现在就看你们的了

translation.en: You have a little over seven hours. Find that nuke.
translation.zh: 你们还有七个多小时的时间 找到那枚核弹

translation.en: "Ready as a dog in heat?" Our blood alcohol's through the roof.
translation.zh: “整装待发”？ 我们血液中的酒精含量高得离谱

translation.en: You shitheads took drugs. We gotta stand down.
translation.zh: 你们这群混蛋还吸了毒 我们必须退出任务

translation.en: We do that, who they gonna replace us with? The fucking FBI?
translation.zh: 如果我们这么做 他们要找谁 来取代我们？该死的联调局吗？

translation.en: Fucking FBI sucks.
translation.zh: 该死的联调局糟透了

translation.en: If they could handle this shit, they'd be handling it.
translation.zh: 如果他们能处理好这破事 他们早就处理了

translation.en: -I hate to admit. She has a point. -[Chad] Even Paul agrees.
translation.zh: -我不得不承认 她说得有道理 -你看 就连保罗也赞同

translation.en: Now I don't care how fucked up we are, Winters.
translation.zh: 我不管我们现在的状态有多糟 温特斯

translation.en: We're still the best in the game.
translation.zh: 我们仍然是最棒的团队

translation.en: Now, let's fucking finish this.
translation.zh: 现在 让我们他妈的结束这一切吧

translation.en: -Okay. We're back on. -[Angela] Let's do this shit.
translation.zh: -好吧 我们继续执行任务 -那就开始吧

translation.en: What do we know?
translation.zh: 我们有什么线索？

translation.en: Koslov sold a fake bomb. But why?
translation.zh: 科索沃卖了一枚假炸弹 但他为什么要这么做？

translation.en: Because he's a lying commie son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 因为他是个满嘴谎言的共产主义者

translation.en: For the last time, Koslov is not a communist.
translation.zh: 我再说最后一次 科索沃不是共产主义者

translation.en: He only cares about money, he… Wait.
translation.zh: 他只在乎钱 他…等等

translation.en: [in Russian] Our guests have arrived and are ready to eat.
translation.zh: 我们的客人已经到了 现在准备开餐了

translation.en: They are waiting for you.
translation.zh: 他们在等你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: [in Russian] Let them wait, it's only appetizers.
translation.zh: 让他们等吧 只是开胃菜而已

translation.en: I'll be on time for the main course.
translation.zh: 等上主菜时 我会准时到的

translation.en: The fake was the appetizer. Real nuke, the main course.
translation.zh: 开胃菜指的是假炸弹 而主菜是真正的核弹

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Think about it.
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -想想吧

translation.en: Koslov could trick the crypto guys into buying a fake
translation.zh: 科索沃知道他可以骗 加密币那群人买假炸弹

translation.en: but only if he had a higher offer.
translation.zh: 但前提是有人给他开了更高的价钱

translation.en: A second buyer?
translation.zh: 你是说第二个买家？

translation.en: It's like selling a bag of oregano to a teenager
translation.zh: 这就像把一袋牛至卖给一个青少年

translation.en: while saving the real deal for someone more savvy.
translation.zh: 并把真正的好东西留给更厉害的人

translation.en: -Oh! -Saw an opportunity to get paid twice.
translation.zh: 他看到了一石二鸟的机会

translation.en: Okay, where's Lerner? She needs to pull up the operation files.
translation.zh: 好吧 勒纳在哪里？ 她需要调出行动文件

translation.en: -She took off about 20 minutes ago. -Took off where?
translation.zh: -她在20分钟前就走了 -走去哪里？

translation.en: ♪ How I got stuck… ♪
translation.zh: （墨西哥淡啤酒）

translation.en: Where's my special cheeseburger?
translation.zh: 我的特制芝士汉堡呢？

translation.en: I already told you. We don't serve food here.
translation.zh: 我已经说过了 我们这里不提供食物

translation.en: Then what the fuck you call this?
translation.zh: 那你他妈管这叫什么？

translation.en: I want my special cheeseburger! Medium rare, plus extra mayo.
translation.zh: 我要我的特制芝士汉堡！ 三分熟 多加点蛋黄酱

translation.en: I'm not supposed to say this, but you've had a little too much to drink.
translation.zh: 听好了 我不该这么说的 但我觉得你有点喝多了

translation.en: You've had a little too much to drink.
translation.zh: 我觉得你有点喝多了

translation.en: Just give her the goddamn burger. Okay? Customer's always right.
translation.zh: 把那该死的汉堡给她 好吗？ 顾客永远是对的

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -没事

translation.en: At least one person in this whole city has my back.
translation.zh: 至少在这座城市里还有一个人支持我

translation.en: Anytime, girl.
translation.zh: 没问题 姐妹

translation.en: Let me guess, boy trouble?
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 因为男人吗？

translation.en: My boss fucked my crush.
translation.zh: 我老板上了我喜欢的人

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I even put on the whipped cream and everything.
translation.zh: 我还涂了鲜奶油什么的

translation.en: You think that's bad?
translation.zh: 你以为这很糟糕吗？

translation.en: My man was supposed to take me to go see J.Lo at Resorts World. Ghosted me.
translation.zh: 我的男人本来要带我去名胜世界看 詹妮弗·洛佩兹的 结果突然消失了

translation.en: The real question is what are we going to do about it?
translation.zh: 真正的问题是我们要怎么做？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: [scoffs] I mean we are two, hot single women in Vegas.
translation.zh: 意思是我们这两个身处于 拉斯维加斯的性感单身女人

translation.en: One of us smells like a goddamn ice cream sundae. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 其中一个闻起来像该死的冰淇淋圣代

translation.en: People ought to be lined up. It's time we do things our way.
translation.zh: 想约我们的人多得要排队 我们该按自己的方式行事了

translation.en: Hey, you want to take a ride with me?
translation.zh: 你想和我一起去兜风吗？

translation.en: Fuck yeah. Ride or die.
translation.zh: 当然 去哪都行

translation.en: Let's do it! You got little titties too. You can shake 'em.
translation.zh: 那就来吧！你也有小奶子 晃一晃吧

translation.en: -You've reached Maya Lerner… -Damn it.
translation.zh: -我是玛雅·勒纳… -该死的

translation.en: Someone give me a laptop. I'll access the files myself.
translation.zh: 给我找一台笔记本电脑 我亲自查看那些文件

translation.en: -Your lab partner left her shit. -[Ava] Ah!
translation.zh: 你的实验室搭档落下了她的东西

translation.en: -About what happened earlier… -Nothing happened.
translation.zh: -关于刚才那件事… -什么事都没有

translation.en: [Ava] Once I access this database,
translation.zh: 一旦我进入这个数据库

translation.en: we'll be able to look at everything and I'll be able to pare down Koslov…
translation.zh: 我们就能一览无余 我就去繁从简 将科索沃的…

translation.en: -Oh shit! -Oh! Fucking gross, Winters.
translation.zh: -卧槽！ -恶心死了 温特斯

translation.en: -The fuck did you eat? -I don't think I ate.
translation.zh: -你到底吃了什么？ -我好像什么都没吃

translation.en: There's chunks of food in there. Is that quesadilla?
translation.zh: 里面有大块的食物 那是墨西哥玉米饼吗？

translation.en: There was quesadillas? No one told me there was quesadillas.
translation.zh: 刚才有墨西哥玉米饼吗？ 没有人告诉我有墨西哥玉米饼

translation.en: There were no quesadillas.
translation.zh: 刚才并没有墨西哥玉米饼

translation.en: Uh… Anybody have a mint?
translation.zh: 有人带了薄荷糖吗？

translation.en: I could go for some quesadillas.
translation.zh: 我真的很想吃墨西哥玉米饼

translation.en: Oh, shit, that may have been drugs.
translation.zh: 糟了 不好意思 那有可能是毒品

translation.en: Fuck the computer.
translation.zh: 去他妈的电脑

translation.en: You want to get that bomb back?
translation.zh: 你想把炸弹找回来吗？

translation.en: Drag Koslov out of his cell and beat it out of him.
translation.zh: 把科索沃从牢房里拖出来 然后揍到他招供

translation.en: Koslov is old-school. His father was KGB. He's not gonna give it up easy.
translation.zh: 科索沃很守旧 他父亲是克格勃的 他是不会轻易招供的

translation.en: He was prepared for this, knew what would happen if we captured him,
translation.zh: 他是有备而来的 他知道如果被我们抓住会有什么后果

translation.en: he knows what happens next.
translation.zh: 他也知道接下来会发生什么事

translation.en: So we're all going to need to sober up real fucking quick.
translation.zh: 所以我们都得他妈的快点清醒过来

translation.en: If the nuke is still out there,
translation.zh: 因为如果核弹还在外面

translation.en: and one of Koslov's men has it, we're back to square one.
translation.zh: 而且还在科索沃的人那里 那我们就回到起点了

translation.en: [man in Russian] The weapon is ready.
translation.zh: 武器准备好了

translation.en: The countdown has begun.
translation.zh: 倒数开始了

translation.en: Have you made contact?
translation.zh: 你们联系上了吗？

translation.en: I have the NSA op.
translation.zh: 国安局的技工在我手上

translation.en: What's taking so long? Get in here, girl! [giggles]
translation.zh: 怎么这么久？快上车吧 姐妹！

translation.en: She doesn't suspect a thing.
translation.zh: 她一点也没怀疑

translation.en: [in Russian] Excellent.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Ooh! I hope there's champs in there, because we getting fucked…
translation.zh: 我希望里面有香槟 因为我们要被搞…

translation.en: -Up! -Up!
translation.zh: -砸了！ -砸了！

translation.en: I already knew. Whoo!
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: All right, we all need to clear our minds,
translation.zh: 好了 我们都得理清思路

translation.en: forget anything that happened tonight, and get back on our A-game. ASAP.
translation.zh: 忘掉今晚所发生的一切 尽快回到我们的最佳状态

translation.en: Everyone.
translation.zh: 每个人都一样

translation.en: -[Hagerty] Ladies and gentlemen. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -先生女士们 -天啊

translation.en: -Shit! -Fuck, Hagerty.
translation.zh: -见鬼了！ -操 哈格蒂

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Hagerty has left the building. -Uh, no.
translation.zh: -哈格蒂已经离开了大楼 -不

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -[Trunk] Shit!
translation.zh: 该死的！

translation.en: -Hagerty? -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -哈格蒂？ -我的天啊

translation.en: -Let's go! We got commies to interrogate! -Let's go! Come on.
translation.zh: -走吧！我们还要去审问共产党员！ -快点！来吧

translation.en: -[Chad] Oh, shit! -[Trunk] Fuck.
translation.zh: -操！ -该死的

translation.en: [Chad] Go!
translation.zh: 出发吧！

translation.en: Everyone strap in!
translation.zh: 大家都系好安全带！

translation.en: -Are you sure you're okay to fly? -Yep, I've got nothing in my system.
translation.zh: -你确定你可以开直升机吗？ -是的 我体内什么都没有

translation.en: Other than an entire bowl of chips and guac.
translation.zh: 除了一整碗薯片和鳄梨酱

translation.en: Thank God one of us is sober.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 我们有一个人是清醒的
